key_algorithm.description: Specify key algorithm used by C(key_secret).

zone.description: DNS record will be modified on this C(zone).

key_name.description: Use TSIG key name to authenticate against DNS C(server)

server.description: Apply DNS modification on this server.

record.description: Sets the DNS record to modify.

key_secret.description: Use TSIG key secret, associated with C(key_name), to authenticate against C(server)
